title: Horoscope of 12 armored animals in 2022
author: admin
description: 2022 Water Tiger Year - 12 Armored Animals (Also known as Gold Jewelry) is started from February 1, 2022 (lunar calendar january 1, 2023) to January 21, 2023 (lunar calendar december 30, 2023). Gradually ranked 3rd in the ranking of 12 Armored Animals. There is an interesting legend about the 12 Armored Animals as follows: The Jade Emperor wants to choose 12 armored animals as his palace bodyguard. He chose The Buffalo as the first because of his honesty and diligence, but beyond everyone's expectations, the intelligent Rat sneaked up on His shadow and took the number one position at a critical time. Tigers are named King of the Forest while Dragons are named The Lord of the Sea, behind Sá»­u. The Cat won the race with the Dragon and won 4th place. Snakes, Horses, Goats, Monkeys and Chickens followed. Dogs are punished as the last for biting cats. In fact, dogs came in 11th, as Pigs (Pigs) came late for the interview - pigs finally came in last place. In 2022, also known as the Year of the Water Tiger, the people who hold the tiger are very strong in their hearts and are not easily defeated, but they are also easier to promote themselves. In 2022, which armors will be rich, lucky, successful, which armor will encounter difficulties, fortunes. Invite you to the 365th Millennium Calendar to see the 2022 Horoscope of 12 Armored Animals. title: Why should you keep a journal?
author: admin
description: A diary is a private place where you can put any thought, feeling, perspective on everything from work, study, affection, friends... Or simply, a journal is where you take notes of whatever you want.

title: How to start journaling?
author: admin
description: Daily journaling is always the most common topic that people take notes on in a notebook. Journaling can help you improve your literary abilities, better understand yourself, reduce stress, and solve many other problems.

title: Planner Handbook Experience
author: admin
description: Carrying a handbook by your side and using it for planning, you probably won't avoid the prying eye shots of many people. At a time when everything can be completed quickly and conveniently with just a few taps, pressing, recording beaks, positive hands to take photos ... Even planning can be very simple and easy. Almost everything has an 'electronic app' to help you get things done more conveniently.

title: Develop Effective Time Management Skills
author: admin
description: Modern society goes hand in hand with having a lot of concerns besides studying, relaxing, earning money, or looking for work. So developing a strategy to manage time for those needs is the right thing to do. Sometimes your time is not enough to compare to the time it takes for the work you need to do, which can lead to stress.

title: Good or Bad Journaling?
author: admin
description: In the old days, it was normal to keep a journal, but now you can keep a journal is considered a phenomenon. Everything is posted on Facebook, Zalo, Blog... already. There's no longer the concept of the first diary in my life.

title: How to understand yourself?
author: admin
description: Have you ever wondered why you're so tired in the middle of this busy life, you're stuck in the middle of a mess with no way out... Everything has its reasons, the above problems appear to be because you cannot understand yourself. Sometimes understanding your heart is more important than you imagined.

title: A small notebook can completely change your life.
author: admin
description: Many people still have thoughts like, 'I don't need to write for tired, reading is enough for me,' a huge mistake! There are many studies that have shown that our brains have a completely different way of looking when we write than when we read or when we talk.
